explains: v. <英，非正式，旧>严斥，斥责；使戴假发；激动，发狂（wig out）
wordGroup: big wig [俚语]要人，大人物，大亨
wigs on the green 打架；激烈争论

sentences.en: She wore glasses and a wig as a disguise.
sentences.cn: 她用眼镜和假发伪装起来。

sentences.en: He's wearing a wig—you can see it a mile off.
sentences.cn: 他戴着假发，你一眼就能看出来。

sentences.en: Jo wore a long wig that made her look very sexy.
sentences.cn: 乔带着一头长长的假发，使她看起来很性感。
